option.name: originalContent
option.value:
spring.application.name=notification-service
# Server Configuration server.port=8092
# Database Configuration #TODO: Update with isolated DB credentials spring.datasource.url=jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/b2g_db spring.datasource.username=user spring.datasource.password=password spring.datasource.driver-class-name=org.postgresql.Driver
# JPA Configuration spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=update spring.jpa.show-sql=true spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.dialect=org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQLDialect spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.format_sql=true
# JWT Configuration jwt.keys.directory=./dev-keys jwt.expiration.access-token=900000 jwt.issuer=b2g-auth-service jwt.audience=b2g-microservices
# Logging logging.level.com.b2g.catalogservice=DEBUG logging.level.org.springframework.security=DEBUG
spring.mail.host=localhost spring.mail.port=1025 spring.mail.username= spring.mail.password= spring.mail.properties.mail.smtp.auth=false spring.mail.properties.mail.smtp.starttls.enable=false spring.mail.properties.mail.debug=true
app.rabbitmq.exchange=b2g.exchange app.rabbitmq.queue.user-signup=user.signup app.rabbitmq.routing-key.signup-ticket=rk.user.registration app.confirmation.base-url=http://localhost:8080

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
spring.application.name=notification-service
# Server Configuration server.port=8092
# Database Configuration #TODO: Update with isolated DB credentials spring.datasource.url=jdbc:postgresql://localhost:5432/b2g_db spring.datasource.username=user spring.datasource.password=password spring.datasource.driver-class-name=org.postgresql.Driver
# JPA Configuration spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto=update spring.jpa.show-sql=true spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.dialect=org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQLDialect spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.format_sql=true
# JWT Configuration jwt.keys.directory=./dev-keys jwt.expiration.access-token=900000 jwt.issuer=b2g-auth-service jwt.audience=b2g-microservices
# Logging logging.level.com.b2g.catalogservice=DEBUG logging.level.org.springframework.security=DEBUG
spring.mail.host=localhost spring.mail.port=1025 spring.mail.username= spring.mail.password= spring.mail.properties.mail.smtp.auth=false spring.mail.properties.mail.smtp.starttls.enable=false spring.mail.properties.mail.debug=true
app.rabbitmq.exchange=b2g.exchange app.rabbitmq.queue.user-signup=user.signup app.rabbitmq.routing-key.signup-ticket=rk.user.registration app.confirmation.base-url=http://localhost:8080
